FuncDef: The display qos hard-pipe ability command displays the IP hard pipe mode supported on interfaces.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the type of an interface.
-

Specifies the number of an interface.
-

Specifies the name of an interface.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 characters.

Examples: E   : The port support exclusive-mode hard pipe.
S   : The port support share-mode hard pipe.
M   : The port need split member interface.
Note: Only ethernet physical port and Eth-trunk can support hard pipe.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view the IP hard pipe mode supported on an interface, run the display qos hard-pipe ability command.
